text: Alternate solution for now using state and altering the button to show a new button with confirm and cancel. Looks good enough for now :smiley:
Hi Johan, yes, we are considering the confirmation dialog in the future. Can you tell me what were you trying to do in your scenario?

Hello! I am trying to use the CLI to set up a dev sandbox for a new portal. I created a new personal access key and it looks like I have all the proper scopes. However, when I use `hs create sandbox`, I end up with the following.
```âœ– Failed to create a development sandbox Test Sandbox.
[ERROR] A StatusCodeError has occurred. 403 - {"status":"error","message":"You can't create/archive a development sandbox for portal 1687417.","correlationId":"fcffb457-23c6-4675-bfa7-b7abdc0b5c37","context":{"hubId":["1687417"]},"category":"BANNED","subCategory":"SandboxErrors.DEVELOPMENT_SANDBOX_ACCESS_NOT_ALLOWED"}```
Can a PM help unban me? Thanks!

Correction, it looks like when I create a new personal access key, it's not providing me with the `developer.app_functions.read` and `developer.app_functions.write` scopes. I checked all the boxes. Is this perhaps the same issue that was fixed back on June 29th for users with portals in the EU? <@U03MPE6V73M>
